item.title: #4 - Magic Leap Y U NO strem
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description:
Join us for another episode of the Exopod! In this edition, Avaer Kazmer, Nick Loomis, Noah Schiffman, and Chris La Torres dissect Magic Leap news, new tech, sdk updates, and more. Check out our blog for more information (link below).
Avaer streams Exokit coding sessions live on Twitch ► https://www.twitch.tv/avaer Join our Slack! ► https://exoslack.now.sh/ Read our blog! ► https://medium.com/webmr Subscribe to Avaer to follow Exokit Development! ► http://bit.ly/exokit-avaer Stop by the Exokit home page for more information/articles. ► http://docs.webmr.io/ Follow Exokit on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/webmixedreality Follow Exokit on Twitter: https://twitter.com/webmixedreality Daily updates to Exokit ► http://bit.ly/exodump For more information on Exokit and its development check out ► https://github.com/webmixedreality/ex...
